cu.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an unknown enum 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing failure and prevent the gNB from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an unknown enum 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing failure and prevent the gNB from starting properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將硬體日誌級別設定為未知的枚舉值 'invalid' 會導致配置解析失敗，並阻止 gNB 正確啟動。
